title: Love it!
txt: I really like this dishwasher. It is quiet and well organized. I can program things like that amount of rinse aid it will use. I love the 3rd shallow upper rack for large knives and utensils. If I changed anything, I would make all of the glass racks a little more slanted so that water will drain off but that's not a big deal. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: When we had to replace our old dishwasher, the Appliance Technician recommended Bosch. It was a b...
txt: When we had to replace our old dishwasher, the Appliance Technician recommended Bosch. It was a bit more expensive than we would normally buy, but it has been worth every penny! I love it! The 3rd rack is amazing, and the tall tub is big enough to hold just about everything I could dream of needing to wash!

title: Did not dry the dishes. Returned immediately....
txt: Did not dry the dishes. Returned immediately.

title: Tremendous Appliance
txt: My old dishwasher stopped working at the start of the COVID 19 lockdown - what horrible timing!  With all meals from home cleaning dishes by hand became a major daily chore.  To the rescue came my Bosch 300!  It has performed sensationally; a large capacity that cleans the variety of the dishes quietly.  Way better than the previous GE Profile even when new.  I did a lot of research on dishwashers before purchasing Bosch and happy to say that it earns its fantastic reputation.

title: This dishwasher is So Quiet!  I only time I...
txt: This dishwasher is So Quiet!  I only time I can tell it is on is when it drains and that it still pretty quiet.

title: Quiet and efficient
txt: We have been regularly running the dishwasher for the past couple of months.  We've settled on using the 60 minute wash as we tend to have dishes that are minimally soiled and have been very satisfied.  The operation is exceedingly quiet.  We particularly like the top rack where we can lay out all the cooking utensils.  Our only issue is that tall wine glasses are somewhat hard to stand up against the side rack, although we manage to do so. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dishwasher
txt: I love my new Bosch. I have to get used to loading it, as it is a little different than my prior one, but I really love it!!!

title: Substantial Improvement over my prior Bosch
txt: This dishwasher is so much better than my, not sure, my former 10-15 year old Bosch.  Cleans beautifully, even in short cycle.  Runs extremely quietly.  The third level flatware tray frees up a big portion of the lower tray for more dishes.  Also, we are fortunate in that the third level opens up directly to the drawer in which we keep our flatware, so off-loading is so easy.  Honestly, no complaints whatsoever. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: So far, very pleased with the dishwasher....
txt: So far, very pleased with the dishwasher.

title: My New Dishwasher
txt: My new Bosch Dishwasher exceeded my expectations. Although I knew I would only replace my old clunky dishwasher with a Bosch I was worried that dishwashers made today would not be as good/quality as my old KitchenAid dishwasher. This one is so fabulous, sleek, quiet, dishes come out super clean and I can fit a ton of dishes in there! My next purchase is going to be a Fridge and of course I'm only buying Bosch from now on. title: First, this thing is really quiet. You will hear water moving around but that may be in your own ...
txt: First, this thing is really quiet. You will hear water moving around but that may be in your own plumbing. Second, it cleans equally well on all three sets of racks. You do have to learn how some items need to be turned to avoid water accumulating in slots where it won't drain. Third, experiment with just how dirty something can be before it won't clean it, and you won't find many things that it fails on.

title: It is more quiet than expected. The 60-minute cycle is...
txt: It is more quiet than expected. The 60-minute cycle is all that is needed for any load. By the way, the capacity seems to be greater than our old whirlpool even though their exterior dimensions are the same.

title: Filtration technology does not work
txt: We were looking forward to bringing a quiet, ultra-reliable Bosch dishwasher home.  The machine is clearly very well-built, and it is ultra quiet.  However, it did not clean my dishes adequately.  The filter sits at the bottom of the dishwasher, so food that is prevented from draining stays in the wash and rinse water.  If we happened to eat an especially greasy meal, our silverware would come out of the washer with a slick film.  Our silverware always came out with a lot of water spots.  We scraped our dishes the same as we did with our previous dishwasher.  We pre-rinsed dishes with starchy or stuck on food.  We ultimately returned this dishwasher to the store and bought a different brand that had a built-in disposal. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: So far I am very impressed.  Quite.. and dishes...
txt: So far I am very impressed.  Quite.. and dishes come out clean and shiny.

title: This machine is very quiet compared to our 30 year...
txt: This machine is very quiet compared to our 30 year old GE and does an excellent washing job.

title: Love our new dishwasher!
txt: Our new dishwasher is everything I was hoping for. I love it so much my 4 yr old calls it my new toy:) It is wisper quiet and cleans like a dream. I love the adjustable upper rack. I had no idea how much I would use this. The only thing I don't like is the lids for the silverware rack must can only be opened or closed i 2 sections. I wish I could open only one little compartment for big spoon that don't fit in the very top rack. Not a huge issues as most do fit in the top rack. If we ever move, I am buying this dishwasher again for sure. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Quiet and we like rack set up of the dishwasher....
txt: Quiet and we like rack set up of the dishwasher.  The only issue, the run cycle time is long

title: LOVE MY BOSCH DISHWASHER
txt: LOVE LOVE LOVE.  The Bosch dishwasher is awesome!  Quiet!  Cleans dishes so much better than my other one.  If you dont have a Bosch dishwasher you are missing out!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dishwasher, Big change over earlier model
txt: We replaced an 10 year old Bosch which was struggling.  The new unit is not quite as quiet as the older unit but is still quiet enough to watch TV in the adjacent room.  Its drain system is much better and we no longer have issues of dirty water not being fully flushed out of the unit.  The new mechanical pushbuttons are much easier to use than the old 'touch panel' that seemed to have a mind of its own.  The only quirk is that when you open the unit you now have to push 'start' button to get the cycle going again.  Until we are fully 'retrained' this results in the dishwasher either not starting its cycle (on delay) or not finishing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great, we love it.
txt: We moved into a new home, everything on one floor.  That meant the kitchen was close to the master bedroom.  So, we wanted the quietest dishwasher available.  Bosch was highly recommended.  At the store, had the best Db rating.  We bought it, we love it, we would recommend it to others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Guess we really needed a new dishwasher
txt: I guess we must have figured the old dishweasher is 15 years old and its developed some quirks.....WRONG.  Installed the new Bosch dishwasher and we weren't just pleasantly surprised, we were shocked.  Can't tell its running by the sound or lack there of.  And everything comes out clean - everything.  No more making excuses for dishes not getting cleaned and no longer having to endure the sound of crushing marbles while it's running.   It's still relatively new, but, so far this has been a great purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Outstanding
txt:
I absolutely LOVE this dishwasher!! After a terrible run with a brand new Fridgedaire dishwasher that never worked out of the box, this one is a Godsend!!  So quiet, so clean and dry when the dishes are done!!  I so wish we had went with Bosch in the beginning!

Thank you for a great product! Will purchase again in future! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Good dishwasher
txt: It's a good dishwasher.  Gets the dishes clean, and is very quiet.  I only have 2 problems with this washer.  1. When you load wine glasses, they are not sturdy the way that Bosch shows you how to load them.  Already had one glass chip in the washer.  2. There is supposed to be a red light on the floor while it is running, and I have yet to see that light.  I know that is a small problem, but there is no troubleshooting guide online on how to fix that so I guess I get no light.  Overall very nice dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love the 3rd rack
txt: This dishwasher seems to clean well and we especially love the 3rd rack for utensils which allows us to fit many more dishes in the lower two racks and run the dishwasher less.  We also like the rinse-aid sensor that lets us know when the rinse-aid is low. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Quiet Dishwasher?
txt: I am not as impressed with my new dishwasher as I had hoped.  I wanted an extremely quiet one which after reviewing what the decibel level was rated at I was very surprised that it isn't as quiet as my old Bosch I had before.... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great machine
txt:
When I bought this machine, there were two major qualities that I was looking for: quality and sound. I wanted a machine that was well made and would do the job well. I know that sounds basic, but in today's world where everything is connected and there are so many bells and whistles attached to expensive appliances, I find it is harder and harder to find. This machine is it. It cleans all my dishes on the first try and feels solid; as well as being backed by the best in the business. It does have some nice features, but as someone who spends most of his time using normal cycles with disinfecting, it had the features I ACTUALLY wanted in a machine that feels like it will last. 

In regard to the sound, the machine is quiet. Not silent, which is fine, but definitely quiet. My dishwasher is in my island which is delineator between the kitchen and the living room where my TV is and I spend most of my show and movie watching time. I can run the cycle and other than the gurgling via my sink once and a while, I barely register that it is running. I even opened it mid-cycle once.

My reaction is don't go super inexpensive. If you can afford it, the machine is definietely worth the money. It looks great, does a great job, and you feel like you are going to get years of service out of it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Wow!  It's soooo quiet
txt: This brand was highly recommended by Larry Luttrell of ABT Appliance in Glenview, Illinois.  We are impressed by the quiet operation and rack set up which is the best dishwasher we have ever had. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Wow!  A quiet dishwasher!!
txt: This brand was highly recommended by the salesman Larry Luttrell of ABT in Glenview, IL.  It has been a great choice and so glad we bought it.  It has many features we appreciate.

title: Love my new dishwasher
txt: I picked the Bosch dishwasher because it was top rated in a consumer review magazine that I trust, and I haven't been disappointed. It was well packaged and easy to install. I love the separate top silverware tray and the flexible layout in general. It is also very quiet. Can't speak to life cycle yet, but I expect to get long years of service according to reviews. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Very happy!
txt: Bought this to replace a very old dishwasher that came with the house and was filthy and leaking. Also noisy. This Bosch dishwasher is super quiet and does a great job at cleaning! Could not be happier [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Perfect dishwasher
txt: I've heard a lot about Bosch appliances but never bought them before. After going through 3 dishwashers within a couple of years, I decided it's time to give it a try. It was the best decision! The Bosch dishwasher cleans the dishes amazingly! It's easy to pack it and unload it. The dishes are sparkly and there's never anything left on them. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher
txt: Had less than a year and already had to have someone out to replace front cover as it discolored in a short time (not by anything I did).  Takes forever (over 2 hours) to run.  Is very quiet however. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: great dishwsher
txt: Love the top rack for all the small items you don't want flying around the dishwasher.  Enough room in the bottom two racks to really fill it up with dishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best Dishwasher Ever
txt:
We needed to replace our recalled/builders grade dishwasher and wanted a quiet one. This Bosch filled the ticket!!  It's so quiet, that I have to go check to see if it's running.  It has a stainless steel interior that just shines.  And a bit of a surprise...I didn't know it had a separate top rack just for silverware.  My silverware has NEVER looked so good.  
With its ease of use, quiet running, and stainless interior, I will always stay with the quality of this Bosch. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: The Best
txt:
I've owned probably every dishwasher on the market: Whirlpool, Kenmore, GE, Maytag...
This is the quietest most efficient one  I've ever owned.  Years of film on my glassware disappeared.  Dried on cheese, salsa and grease are gone.  I've always had to wash my dishes before putting them in the dishwasher. Not anymore.  Don't waste your money on the others.  You deserve the best. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Pretty good dishwasher
txt:
We replaced a 3 year old Whirlpool dishwasher which was fine until the circuit board fried on us.  After replacing that, the pump went out 3 weeks later.  So it was time to switch.
We opted for the Bosch brand base on reputation and reviews.  So far we have been generally pleased with it.  It does a very nice job of cleaning.  We don't use the drying cycle, nor do we use a rinse aid, but it still does well without those.  It helps to crack the door open at the end of the cycle before we head for bed; then things are pretty dry in the morning when we unload it.
I had read one review (after we ordered it) that this Bosch can be smelly.  I think ours has a bit of an odor, but it's not offensive.  It's only two months old, and we haven't run a dishwasher cleaner though it. 
The other thing that has taken some getting used to is the arrangement of the racks.  What worked in the Whirlpool for loading doesn't work well in the Bosch.  After learning to "work with it", it's fine.  The third rack on top is very handy and we use it a lot.
All in all, we are well satisfied with our unit.  It's not the top of the line nor the cheapest model, but worth the price. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: So far so good!! I'm extremely pleased with my choice. The 300 series is su...
txt: So far so good!! I'm extremely pleased with my choice. The 300 series is suuuuuuuuuper quiet and it washes very well. Absolutely love that there are 3 rows. Although the bottom row is configured slightly goofy, but it's not really a big deal. I recommend finding out what kind of electrical hookup you currently have in your house with your current dishwasher before buying this one (or any new dishwasher for that matter). We found out the hard way that didn't have an outlet behind our old dishwasher so my boyfriend had to install one. For someone who knows what their doing, it was no big deal. But if you paid for home depot to install, and then they found out they couldn't hook it up to electrical, you'd be stuck with a dishwasher in the middle of your kitchen until you got an electrician out to your house to configure an outlet. Pain in the butt!! But we've had no other issues with this so far. I'm in love!

title: Happy with New Dishwasher
txt:
The things we particularly like about our new dish washer are: 
(1) it's dish loading capacity which is signifacantly larger than our old dishwasher,
(2) the third rack which we use for silverware and
(3) its extremely quiet operation. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Cleans well and is quiet
txt: overall it works well and is very quiet. However, sometimes leaves food debris on dishes, probably due to the fact that we are on a well and pressure is not the best. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Do not waste your money
txt: Dishes are always wet even using extra dry ‘features’.  Silverware and glassware always have marks where they rested against the rack.  I hate this piece of inappropriate language and if there was a way to get my money back I would do it in a heartbeat.

title: Doesn’t dry, poorly configured bottom rack
txt: Doesn't dry at all (doesn't vent to the outside of the dishwasher, so I'm not sure how it could; wish I had known that before I bought it). The bottom rack does not have enough times to hold a lot of items in place. Overall, very disappointed compared to the Kenmore it replaced. I chose it because of the Bosch name and reputation for longevity, and now I am hoping it will die soon.

title: Dishwasher
txt: Works above and beyond expectation. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch Dishwasher
txt:
Absolutely awesome!
I've owned one before in a previous house and the upgrades on this newer one are great. They are a separate pullout for utensils and easy to use upper rack-height adjustments. I went with the display set in on the door so I could see time remaining on the cycle. It is so quiet that our brand new fridge can be heard over this dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: My dishwasher
txt: I have had my dishwasher a little over a month now.  I love the simplified features on the machine. I like the on /off button and the options on the panel and the adjustable trays along with a flatware shelf on the very top of the interior.  I am very satisfied with this product and would recommend this dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch dishwasher
txt: I have had my dishwasher a little over a month now.  I love the simplified features on the machine. I like the on /off button and the options on the panel and the adjustable trays along with a flatware shelf on the very top of the interior.  I am very satisfied with this product and would recommend this dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best dishwasher ever
txt: My Bosch dishwasher is wonderful! I knew that it was quiet as my brother has owned three of them and I was impressed with the functionality of his appliances. Therefore, I ordered the 300 series in stainless steel and am so delighted with the third rack which holds the utensils, how exceptionally clean it leaves all the dishes and glasses, the adjustable racks, the quality of the stainless steel and of course how quietly it runs. Bravo Bosch!!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch 300 Series Dishwasher
txt:
I have the dishwasher about a month & everything works great. Cleans fantastic, runs quite. I just fill it up, push the desired wash, push start & it's off. Dishes come out clean & dry!!  First time I owned a Bosch & I am very pleased!!!
Thank you,  Cheryl [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Worth the Wait
txt: Our old dishwasher died at the beginning of the pandemic shut-down.  I checked reviews and ratings and this was the machine I chose.  We had to wait several weeks but the wait was worth it.  I wasn't sure I would use the third rack, but it has become my favorite feature.  No more sorting silver from the basket - presorting for third rack makes it so easy to put the silver into the drawer.  The machine loads easily and holds a lot.  I like being able to load plastics anywhere as there is no heating element on the bottom.  The resulting poor drying is the only drawback.  Using rinse-aid is necessary for optimal drying.  After several weeks, I am quite satisfied with the new dishwasher.  Now I am hoping it will last 15 years like my old one did!

title: Good Replacement
txt: I replaced a Maytag dishwasher with this one.  The Bosch 300 Series is so much larger, which I love.  I also really like the silverware on the top shelf, don't have to reach down for them.  I haven't been pre-rinsing and my dishes come out clean.  I use Auto and Sanitize.  The con is the smell.  I agree with other reviews on this.  But it doesn't make me wish I didn't buy it as its only noticeable when I open the door.  ha ha  Its a good, solid dishwasher.

title: Bosch review
txt:
I love my new Bosch dishwasher!
Every morning I open the door to sparkling clean dishes and silverware, every item completely clean and dry.
And its so quiet!  I also like how solid and sturdy it sounds when I open and close the door, or roll out the different trays.  The top tray for silverware is especially easy to put items on and remove them when clean.
I researched a long time before choosing your  brand , and am delighted with my choice.  Thank you for being a company that still has pride of workmanship! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Quality Dishwasher
txt: This dishwasher is great, the wife likes everything about it. Very quiet, the top shelf for flatware, knives, etc is very handy. The wiring,  hoses and included hardware were all quality pieces. You will not regret paying a little more, and getting one of these machines. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Clean 'n' Quiet
txt: Love the 3rd rack. Very quiet. Hardly hear it when on. Excellent job cleaning. Good job drying. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Fantastic
txt: My wife and I love our dishwasher it is definitely superior to our last appliance it gets our dish is sparkling clean and we appreciate the one hour cycle [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great dish washer

title: Quiet and effective cleaning.
txt: Top (third) rack is handy; didn't have that on our last dishwasher which was a 20 year old Bosch.  Silverware basket is larger and offers multiple levels to better position varying length handles.  Exterior appearance has a clean look. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch dishwasher
txt: The best dishwasher I've ever had. It's so quiet you wonder if it's on. It cleans your dishes pots and pans immaculately even if they have sat in there for days. I love the silverware tray that pull out from the top. The roominess is amazing. It's more expensive than most dishwashers but definitely worth every penny. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It is very quiet. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Gives a great wash, quiet running, clean look. Very pleased
txt: Gives a great wash, quiet running, clean look. Very pleased

title: A part of my 10-year-plan
txt:
I've lived in places with other brands, even grew up with a "competitor". In one of the many apartments I rented in my early twenties, was a Bosch dishwasher. For the first time ever I didn't have to pre-soak, or pre-scrub, or pre-wash before using this dishwasher. It may seem silly, but it changed my life. Those few minutes add up over time! I decided, when I purchased my own home, I'd be getting a Bosch. 

Lo and behold, I'm about two and a half years into my first home purchase. The dishwasher that came with the home was okay...it did a decent job at cleaning but left everything wet.  

It was recently my birthday, so I treated myself to my Bosch dishwasher. Things come out SUPER CLEAN the first time and DRY! I absolutely love the display on the outside––no having to guess if the cycle is complete. The manual was easy to understand, it was very helpful to learn to efficiently load this machine. I'm looking forward to many years of my Bosch dishwasher! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch Dishwasher
txt: I love our new dishwasher. It's very quiet and does a great job getting dishes clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Amazing!
txt: Best dishwasher I've ever had!  Super quiet, and dishes come out spotless!

title: I have had my new dishwasher for about 2 weeks...
txt: I have had my new dishwasher for about 2 weeks and I am very pleased. Replaced a Miele so, the competition was steep. This machine is very quiet and cleans/drys well. I took out the lower utensil basket and only use the third tray.

title: Love my new dishwasher. It cleans excellently. If you want your plastic dishes or containers to...
txt: Love my new dishwasher. It cleans excellently. If you want your plastic dishes or containers to come out totally dry, then this washer is not for you. This is the only thing that I would say is a downfall. But everything comes out crystal clean. All in all I love this machine!! Also very quiet!!

title: My Favorite Kitchen Appliance (Sad I Know LOL)
txt: PureDry allowing you to put plastics on bottom rack is epic. Dishes still come out piping hot and dry without heating elemen!! Adjustable middle rack is amazingly useful. Third rack is awesome and way more useful than you would think. Only draw back is it's a little cumbersome to load. Cups and don't fit particularly well bowls can be a bit awkward. You'll adjust and won't even notice after. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Very quiet.... easy to install ......
txt: Very quiet.... easy to install ...

title: Works great, easy to use. Could be a little quieter but really have no complaints
txt: Works great, easy to use. Could be a little quieter but really have no complaints

title: a great dishwasher
txt: This is the best dishwasher ever. Extremely quiet, and the dishes are sparkling clean.

title: Latest Bosch dishwasher.
txt:
We had a very good top end Bosch dishwasher.  The handle screws and end caps came loose.  The only way to repair it is to remove the inside panel.  The dealer where we purchased it acknowledged they have never attempted to remove the inside panel over concerns that it could leak.  The dishwasher worked perfectly.  Very very quiet.  Hardly heard it running.  The dishwasher was 12 years old.

We live in a rural area so it is difficult to find a qualified repair person.  So we decided to purchase a new Bosch dishwasher only this one does not have one of the handles.  

The dishwasher does a good job.  Only problem is it is noisy. Very noisy.  I told the same dealer we wanted a quiet dishwasher like the other one.  He said you don't have to worry becUse it is a Bosch.  

Well that's not the case. This dishwasher sounds like a builders grade model you would find in an apartment.  You can hear this thing in our bedroom on the other end of the house from where it is located in the kitchen.  Very disappointed in the sound level of this Bosch Dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Generally good.  The lower dish rack is not convenient. It's layout makes it hard to get the dish...
txt:
Generally good. 

The lower dish rack is not convenient. It's layout makes it hard to get the dishes in. Other dishwashers are much better there. The silverware basket is bad. I replaced it with one from my previous GE Profile dishwasher which also had a better lower dish rack. However, the Bosch does seem to have more total room.

The third rack is quite good. I don't use it for silverware although I'm sure it would do fine for that. I just find it more useful to hold things like tongs, large stirring spoons, large knives and Tupperware lids.

I also removed the coffee cup racks in the upper rack. We don't use the small coffee cups nor wine glasses so all it did was block out our larger glasses.

My review sounds negative, but I'm actually reasonably pleased with the dishwasher. It does an excellent job of cleaning the dishes and is very quiet.

The installers did not do the lower kick-plate as the screw holes did not line up. I installed with some double-sided tape.

title: Love this Dishwasher
txt:
I have owned several dishwashers, but Bosch truly is the best.  No one can match the features, dependability and service offered by this company.  The main reason for my selection is the DB rating or how quiet it is.  No one likes to sit and hear a dishwasher slosh around water and have the pump noise running in the back ground.

There is never a problem with the dishes not getting clean.  

We down sized and bought a new house.  The builder wouldn't install a Bosch without charging a huge amount of money.  So the day we closed we had our local appliance dealer install our Bosh dishwasher.  Sold the builder model for a few bucks.  It was very disappointing to see how little insulation was on the unit that was removed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Quiet, quiet, quiet. I can barely hear it run standing...
txt: Quiet, quiet, quiet. I can barely hear it run standing right next to it. Cleans dishes, glasses, and utensils wonderfully. I recommend using Jet Dry to obtain spotless glasses.

title: Dishwasher
txt: Very disappointing, does not dry completely, it does not matter if its extra dry or sanitize, always wet.

title: Best dishwasher ever
txt: In all my years I've never encountered a better organized dishwasher, it is wonderful!  They engineered an asymmetrical layout so there is a home for everything.  It's also customizable, so tall items and cereal bowls cut nicely. Genius. Things come out sparkling clean, just a tad wetter than I'd hope. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great machine
txt: Does an excellent job of washing and great job of drying even without heating elements. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher
txt: Can't believe how quiet this dishwasher is!  Cleans dishes without scrubbing them first. So happy we decided on this one!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Difficulty drying dishes
txt: I tried all of the recommendations to get my dishes dry to no avail. After trial and error, I found that opening the door when the wash cycle is complete solves the problem. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Incredibly quiet!!! You barely notice that it is running. It cleans way better than my previous F...
txt: Incredibly quiet!!! You barely notice that it is running. It cleans way better than my previous Frigidaire dishwasher. Everything comes out really shiny. The only negative is you have to run the extra dry option or it will not dry very well. All of the pros of this machine far outweigh the one con.

title: Value: Fair
txt:
We bought the 800-series to get features and quality. Unfortunately, our unit is plagued with an error-prone display and we also have seen better "cycle complete" systems.

Our display frequently has errors we have to reset, and for new users, this process is not straightforward. We're used to it now.

Additionally, the finishing touch is how a dishwasher lets users know that a cycle has been completed. On this unit, no such notification exists. Previous units owned have had a nice, subtle, but easily visible, green light reflecting off the kitchen floor under the unit. If I or my wife run the unit, and the other comes home a few hours later, instead of a notification light, we have to remember to leave a magnet on the front or she may put dirty dishes in on accident.

On a personal note, the unit does have a light underneath during operation, which is somewhat helpful, but it's red, and much as we like red in general, it seems a bit too serious on a dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: So far so good. This is replacing a 5 year old
txt: It has been a much better machine than my Whirlpool. Love the silverwear basket.  Great choice. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love it!

title: Very quiet
txt: This dishwasher require extra work during installation. For example, it is not direct-wired, you need to install special electrical junction box. And you need to secure this washer with 2 screws to its enclosure. But the main difference of it is sound. It is almost silent. The baskets, the cycles, the water usage are good, but most dishwashers have good baskets and cycles, too.  We have Bosh 300 series only 3 months, so I don't know about reliability and repairability yet.

title: Finally!

txt: Pros - Super quiet as advertised, cleans exceptionally well. Once you figure out best way to load your stuff it can hold a ton and gets everything super clean. Third rack is way more convenient than you would think. Adjustable middle rack is awesome. Not having heating element allows for plastics to be put on bottom rack but somehow stuff is still dry and very hot to touch when cycle ends.Cons - Aside from plates, loading anything else has a learning curve and/or can be awkward. Racks don't quite fit cups well, bowls can be awkward too. But nothing you can't figure out.Summary - Buy this thing. No joke.

title: Strong silent type
txt: After 27 years with our Kenmore dishwasher, we were looking for a replacement with the same staying power.  Family members recommended BOSCH so we purchased the BOSCH 300 Series dishwasher.  Strong points: it is extremely quiet, has a top drawer plus large basket for utensils, and has adjustable racks for odd-sized/oversized dishes.  Drawbacks: if you don't choose the Extra Dry option the dishes are wet at the end of the cycle and the selection of this option adds about 20 minutes to an already long cycle (total time nearly 3 hours). Overall, we are happy with the dishwasher.  We installed it about 2 weeks ago.  We initially had an issue with drying.  We have to use the sanitize feature and rinse aid in order to get them 95% dry.  

The 3rd rack is a nice feature, however, loading that with silverware leaves the traditional silverware basket for large spoons and spatulas.  These items are too tall for that basket.

Top tray for large utensils excellent, adjustable middle tray helpful and silverware tray useful when top tray filled with large utensils.  Drying functionality fine despite reviews to contrary.  Only drawback is lower tray doesn't offer much flexibility and/or space for large dishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher
txt: I love my new dishwasher.  It is so quiet, and cleans everything so good.  I really like the way it is designed inside for loading plus the third rack comes in very handy.  This is way better than any dishwasher I have ever had. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch dishwasher
txt: Our dishwasher cleans well.  It does not dry plastic at all even with the extra dry option.  After the cycle which lasts 2 hrs and 9 minutes, it is helpful to prop the door open to allow water to escape.  This does help with the drying.  If you run it when you go to bed, you will have to hand dry the top rack.  I like the lights on the front of the unit.  It is easy to tell when it has completed the wash.  I like how quiet it is. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch 300 dishwasher.
txt: I like this dishwasher it is super quit, What I don't like is the way the racks are configured. I find it hard to fit many of my dishes. I found us using the tiney 3rd rack at the very top for our silverware instead of the one that goes in the bottom rack. As far as the machine itself it works pretty good. I don't like having to use chemicals to dry since it does not have a heating element. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Mostly happy
txt:
A lot of good things to say about it, such as the quiet operation and the adjustable upper rack which ive utilized a few time now.   I also love the flat 3rd rack which is a great place for small items that are otherwise vulnerable to falling through and the indicator for adding the rinse aid. 

Things that could be better:   There's no really good place for bowls.  Cereal bowls are limited to side of upper rack. Larger bowls fall forward with nothing to hold them in place.   

The folding tines would be a good if they could be removed and relocated to where they are  needed or were perhaps taller to hold awkward items in place; but the ones on the bottom don't accomplish much 

That said, I do like the dishwasher and am overall happy with the purchase.

title: Best kitchen helper
txt: Bosch does a great job with their dish washers. Having a third pull out for flat ware is a big bonus. The adjustable heights are easy to use. I found their helpful hints on how to load for best washing results very useful. Have a slight issue with the stopping mechanism on the flatware shelf. Because it's a lightweight shelf it pulls out off track if not pulled from the very center. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Silent and efficient

txt: This dishwasher is very quite and does a good job cleaning.  I does have somethings that could be inproved.  The bottom drawer rides on rollers, when challegned with heavier objects the rollers sometimes go off track.  Even though a little more expensive, I think a railing system, similar to the top rack maybe a better fit. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Look nice, but would have been great if the fact it does not dry dishes was more pronounced.  Thi...
txt:
Look nice, but would have been great if the fact it does not dry dishes was more pronounced.  This does a "condensation" dry, which really does not work for us.  Very quiet. Cycle is almost 3 hours long.  No option to return after we found out the drying issue due to Home Depots strict appliance return policy.
We normally shop more carefully and thoroughly for appliances, researching multiple brands at a variety of locations, but since our dishwasher broke at the beginning of the Washington stay-at-home order, we couldn't go shopping in person and had to do online / sight-unseen.  Will not likely buy another appliance from Home Depot due to the stringent return policy.  I now feel stuck with this non-drying dishwasher for years.

Problem areas include rinse aid seems to leak out about as fast as you load it.  I find the middle rack a little difficult to load with glasses.  Overall a very classy machine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great piece of machinery. Just had 4 days. Hard to...

title: I absolutely love my Bosch dishwasher!  It is...
txt: I absolutely love my Bosch dishwasher!  It is so quiet, does a fabulous job of cleaning, and is easy to operate.  It more than met my expectations!

title: Good quality and very quiet.  A couple of design...
txt: Good quality and very quiet.  A couple of design features lower the grade.  The bottom rack frequently goes off track when pushing it back in.  There isn't anything to hold it in alignment when being pushed in.  Otherwise it is a great dishwasher.

title: Works good and quiet
txt: Works good and quiet

title: Great experience from purchase by phone to install to using...
txt: Great experience from purchase by phone to install to using the product. Five stars to both Home Depot and Bosch.

title: Really wanted the third shelf and this one is perfect...
txt: Really wanted the third shelf and this one is perfect for me.

title: Outstanding Product
txt: Far away the best dishwasher I have ever owned extremely quiet does a beautiful job with our dishes [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: 300 Series - Excellent dishwasher
txt: We couldn't be happier with our new 300 series Bosch dishwasher. Great capacity, all the dishes and pans come out completely clean, and is so silent! What a great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: dishwaher
txt: I'm pleased ith this appliance's performance. Dishes are clean & dry & the noie level is very low. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best dishwasher out there
txt: This is the most quietest and efficient dishwasher out there. I have recommended it to a lot of my friends and family [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Welcome to our kitchen
txt: We had our previous dishwasher for 23 years and were very happy with it. When it started to leak, we really did not want a replacement, but after some research (incl Consumers Report) we decided on the Bosch 300/ SHEM63W55N. We have not regretted the purchase. In fact I (the female part of the buyers)fell in love with this dishwaher and its features, i.e. capacity, quietness, low energy use. Yes, even at 70 years of age you can find a new love... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great product
txt: I especially like the 3rd rack for small dishes and extra silverware. My Bosch is so quiet it runs anytime even during conversation.  Dishes are always clean and sanitized. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Excellent dishwasher
txt: When it was time to replace our 12 year old, builder grade dishwasher, we looked at many dishwashers.  But in the end we chose a Bosch.  We love the 3rd shelf and the adjustable 2nd shelf.  We like the fact that some of the racks can fold down to make room for larger items. And this dishwasher seems to hold more items than our last one.  Most of all, we love how quiet it is.  We can turn it on and watch TV at the same time in the great room and not hear the  dishwasher.  (The kitchen and great room are one big room). Before we had to run the dishwasher late at night when we were in bed and we could still hear it.  We like it so much that we recommended it to my husband's cousin and they went out and bought the same dishwasher recently. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher
txt: Very impressed with the efficiency & quiet running of the dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher thats worth the money
txt: This model is extremely quiet and does a wonderful job in cleaning the dishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Awesome Dishwasher
txt: Quiet, thoughtful design - love the silverwar rack, amazing cleaning power.  My favorite dishwasher ever! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love it!
txt: Quiet, efficient, dries beautifully Live the top shelf. Used to higher end appliances and this product does not disappoint. A great value. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Elegant and Efficient
txt: I used to think that dishwashers were all about the same but I have changed my mind since buying this Bosch dishwasher. I'm very impressed with the functionality of having three racks and that the middle rack can be moved up or down, to give a few inches either way. It may be a small addition but the flatware/utensil rack is my favorite feature. It makes unloading the flatware so easy. My dishes come out dry and spotless. Two other features that make this dishwasher excellent are the 24/7 sensor that prevents leaks and the easy to remove self-cleaning filter. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Everything we were hoping
txt:
We were in need of a new dishwasher as out old one was just so noisy that there was no question when it was running.  
As we solicitated opinons from friends and a few repair men the Bosh kept comming up.
We have not been disappionted!  The only challenge that we had was finding the best place and orientation for our cereal bowls.  The don't quite rest securely on the top shelf so to the bottom they must go.
Every item that we have washed has come out clean.  We have been using Cascade pods and jet dry with great results.
The noise difference is phenomenal, this dishwasher is so quite that I have looked for the lights just to make sure it is running. 
Thank you Bosch for a great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: So far so good. Hope the electronic control panel holds...
txt: So far so good. Hope the electronic control panel holds up.

title: Hello?
txt: Hello? Are you on?  We can't hear yoooooooou! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Everything it is advertised to be.
txt:
This dishwasher does everything they say it will do.
We are very satisfied. Can't say anymore then that. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Upgraded to a Bosch!! No regrets.
txt: We love our new Bosch dishwasher. It is a work horse and smartly built. We love to extra tray on top. Very happy we upgraded. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: The best I have ever owned
txt: I feel better when I wake up every morning to see my kitchen clean, dishes sparkling

title: love this dishwasher
txt: I love this dishwasher it's cleans spotless and the controls are at an angle so you can read them easily  I recommend purchasing this washer

title: Quiet Quality
txt: We purchased this after research of ratings online and have not been disappointed.  It is VERY quiet and does a very good job cleaning.  Using the dealer recommended detergent does provide better results.  We did not care for the silverware caddy and have removed it opting for the upper tray for silverware.  We are still working to determine the best ways for loading.  With all the fold up and down holders it is surprisingly difficult to find the best layout for loading plates, bowls, etc.

title: A well-designed dishwasher
txt: I have probably owned 10 dishwashers in my lifetime and this one is by far the closest to perfection.  It is so well designed; it uses every nook and cranny.  I love the feature that it simply can't leak and spoil the wood floor!  The dishes are squeaky clean; my old glassware looks brand new again.  I bought this because it was a "best buy" in Consumers' Report and it has lived up to its description. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Fantastic Washer
txt:
I am really enjoying my Bosch 300 series dish washer. When I went shopping for a new washer after my 30 year old washer kicked the bucket, I was overwhelmed by all the choices. This Bosch washer came to my attention through the recommendation by Wirecutter.

It is very quiet, loads well, and has the third upper shelf that I use for utensils. This means I don’t have to use the basket in the bottom rack and so much space is filled up. It was definitely worth the extra money to get the model with the third rack. 

The only drawback is that it doesn’t dry plastic very well. I knew this going in because it was pointed out in The Wirecutter review, and I’m okay with that. The other benefits outweigh some slightly still wet plastic containers. 

Also, it was simple to install and looks great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great at cleaning my dishes!
txt:
I really enjoy my Bosch 300 series dishwasher! 
The dishes get really clean and it runs So quiet. The first time I ran a cycle I was amazed how quiet it was. It sounded as if someone on the far side of the house Was filling up a bathtub. Like I knew some water was running but not in the same room! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: The best dishwasher on the market
txt: Unquestionably, the best dishwasher we have ever owned, and we have had multile brand name machines.  Quiet, supremely efficient and performing beyond expectations (which were high based on research) the Bosch 300 is well worth the price, and provides the most outstanding results imainable.  Ease of installation, coupled with low operating costs, make this the winner.  We would unreservedly recommend this machine to eeryone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Good Value
txt: This dishwasher is quiet. We are still learning the various features and optimal loading configurations. The drying cycle is still learning in progress. The cycles take a longer time than our older unit; however, the dishes come out much cleaner, without any film. Still up for debate is where to put silverware-the thin, third shelf or the rack on the botton shelf. YouTube offers a variety of videos with tips and opinions on such topics, which are very informative and helpful. twWe are very satisfied overall. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Amazing dishwasher
txt:
This is my second Bosch dishwasher.  Buying the second was a no brainer for me.  The quality and style are far superior than other brands friends and family have.
The new features on my new dishwasher are fantastic. (60 min and extra-dry)
Also, I didn't think possible, it got even more quiet.  On several occasions, not looking at the lights on front, I opened the door to place another dish inside, but to my surprise, it was in mid-cycle.
I highly recommend this dishwasher and give 15 stars out of 10!
Thanks Bosch!!!

title: Happy customer
txt: Very good machine. Cleans well, quiet , very important, drying could be a little better but over all very happy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Very industrial
txt: This unit does exactly what it is supposed to,  with little fanfare, but still a good unit. Con: very long wash time on auto function (over 2 hours), some smell as noted by others online (but no odor or taste on the dishes), not smudge resistant at all and a loud clacking sound when it locks and unlocks.  Pro: very flexible shelving, super quiet (even compared to a not-so-old) previous model and cleans everything with no excuses. I would recommend it if you are like me and are most interested in tools doing what they are meant to do. I would avoid it if you want the newest, prettiest thing.

title: Bosch 300 dishwasher
txt: Love it!  Quietest dishwasher I've ever owned.  love the third rack for utensils to save room for more items on lower level.  it's a winner. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher jackpot
txt: We purchased this BOSCH 300 Series SHEM63W55N about one month ago. We cannot beleive the difference it made. It gets all the dishes extremely clean whereas before with the LG we needed to look at each dish before we put it away because it missed so much. It is also very quiet and easy to use. The buttons are simple and there is no guessing as to what you are doing. We are thrilled with the performance of this appliance. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: This is extremely quiet!  The only con is the dishes do not come out completely dry.
txt: This is extremely quiet!  The only con is the dishes do not come out completely dry.

title: Bosch 300 Series Dishwasher
txt: We've only had our Bosch dishwasher about two months and it has exceeded our expectations.  Bosch came highly recommended by my sister who had one installed at her beach house and abother when she remodeled her kitchen in her family home two years later. She's very hard to please; so when she said she loves her Bosch, it was enough for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dishwasher
txt: We love our new Bosch dishwasher. Easy to load, many washing/drying options [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love this dishwasher!
txt: This dishwasher is fantastic! It gets the dishes so clean and it is so quiet that at first we didn't think it was even running! I love Bosch products! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher takes over 2hours to wash a load and then...
txt: Dishwasher takes over 2hours to wash a load and then no matter what you try the dishes do not dry and everything has to be hand dried on every load.  Tried adding jet dry, doesn’t help.  Only good quality is It runs very quiet!

title: Exactly what we were looking for. Very quiet. Beats the...
txt: Exactly what we were looking for. Very quiet. Beats the competition in quality and price. Definitely recommend the version that has the bar.  Easy to self install.

title: Bosch Dishwasher
txt: We replaced our old Bosch dishwasher with the new 300 series unit. While the old Bosch was a good machine, the new unit is, by far,  superior. It is eerily quiet. You don't even know that it's running. It cleans everything spotlessly. On a scale of 1-10, I would give it an 11! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love it.
txt: I much preferred the front controls and a recessed handle. I like the third rack. Items come out spotless. It's quiet. It was an easy install. Perfect machine for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Fits all the dishes we use everyday like a champ....
txt: Fits all the dishes we use everyday like a champ.  And gets everything clean.

title: Five stars for the quality of the machine. So very quiet, yet so effective! Love the third rack f...
txt:
Five stars for the quality of the machine. So very quiet, yet so effective! Love the third rack for flatware and utensils and the adjustments for large/tall items are an added advantage.
Installation was a little more than bargained for in an older home with copper water lines and direct wiring. If you plan on a diy installation, be sure to get the associated installation parts. You can always take them back if you don't need them. Fortunately, husband is an installation genius so up and running within the day. Overall, quite pleased.

title: I purchased the Bosch and installed myself (I'm a Bldg...
txt: I purchased the Bosch and installed myself (I'm a Bldg contractor). Bosch is one of the best Dish Washers on the market and I have installed many. The only draw back that needs to be known is that it is not an installation for newbies... even if you have done one in the past. The 300 Bosch has to be plumbed and powered differently than any other dishwasher.. The water supply line and drain requires some careful planning and would recommend professional installation. Other than the install it has been a great machine. It very quiet and has enough racks to accommodate a number of different tastes in loading.

title: Very pleased with Bosch Dishwasher
txt: Dishes are washed well even on the short 60 minute cycle which is what I use all the time.  Upper tray is useful for many items.Digital display is easy to use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great product as expected
txt: Very quiet and leaves dishes n silver ware spotless.we use every day and are very satisfied w our purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Cleans like a Dream!
txt: Easy to use, great choice of settings.  Dishes haven't been this clean in years. The top shelf is fantastic for knives, serving spoons, utinsels that need cleaning. And... so QUIET! Also, appreciate the leak detection feature...which was the reason we lost the last dishwasher and had to remodel our kitchen after water damage. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: The very best dishwasher I have ever owned.
txt: Sometimes I think this will never comw clean but everthing comes out sparkling. Love the 3rd rack. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch Rules
txt: We owned a Bosch 15-20 years ago in a previous house.  Just put this model into second house and it's as wonderful as before, and so quiet!  Love the upper shallow flatware rack.  Using it, and removing the flatware basket in the lower rack, provides much more room.

title: Good dishwasher
txt: So we've had our dishwasher for over a month now and have done at least two dozen loads through it. It's pretty quiet and I like the third rack for flatware and other small items. The reason it's not getting five stars is the layout of the lowest rack. It's difficult to line up bowls there. Something about the spacing between the tines doesn't really allow for easy and efficient loading. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: HEAVEN
txt: I never owned a dishwasher and I decided to treat myself.  I did a lot of reasearch and this machine came up tops!! I LOVE it and during the current quarantine it has saved my life...I am cooking so much and am able to put everything in my fabulous dishwasher at the end of the day!!!  It's SO quiet and everything comes out clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: A real cleaner!
txt: I'm impressed how clean everything comes out. That third rack is also really nice for the utinsils. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Not hard to install. But did not come with parts...
txt: Not hard to install. But did not come with parts needed for installation.

title: Works and cleans fine, looks good, very quiet, really like the third shelf. Display on 'top of d...
txt: Works and cleans fine, looks good, very quiet, really like the third shelf. Display on 'top of door machines' does not countdown remaining time which isn't really noted until page 39 of the "Use and Care Manual." The 'Red Dot' on the floor lets you know when cycle is finished.

title: Wife loves it ...
txt: Wife loves it

title: Make sure the installer runs a cycle to make sure...
txt: Make sure the installer runs a cycle to make sure it's hooked up right.This washer is very quiet.

title: This is a very quiet and efficient unit. It has...
txt: This is a very quiet and efficient unit. It has a high capacity, and is versitile. There are two nits to pick: first, unless uses the extra dry option, dishes (and tops of curved surfaces) to not dry completely. Second, it leaked upon installation: the plastic attachment needed replacement.

title: Very quiet dishwasher.  Bottom rack is falling off the...
txt: Very quiet dishwasher.  Bottom rack is falling off the track as it goes in.  Contacting Bosch about this issue.  Disappointed that we are having issues with what seems to be a quality dishwasher in other respects.

title: Dishwasher cleans well, but developed a leak at the output...
txt: Dishwasher cleans well, but developed a leak at the output of the water pump after using it only a couple of times.  Now it shuts down after running about an hour,and displays error code 15.

title: Excellent improvement over my 15 year old dishwasher. Incredibly quiet....
txt: Excellent improvement over my 15 year old dishwasher. Incredibly quiet. Top rack is convenient for utensils, such as knives and chopsticks. Main inconvenience is that delivery and installation are done by two separate teams, requiring two different schedulings, not clear at time of sale.

title: Great Purchase
txt: This dishwasher is an excellent machine.  Exceptionally quiet and does an outstanding job of cleaning dishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Cleans very, very well. I love the steel interior. It heats up the dishwasher to sanitization lev...
txt: Cleans very, very well. I love the steel interior. It heats up the dishwasher to sanitization levels. I mean, when you open the door after a cycle, it is very hot (which is good). It dries everything but the plastic containers. No longer have to wipe items off before putting them away (except for plastic containers). Also, love the 3rd shelf for tableware. I removed the tableware holder from the side of the bottom rack to make it larger because the 3rd rack works perfectly for tableware.

title: Incredibly clean
txt: I was never able to have my coffee mug's stains removed with our older dishwasher, but oh boy this one did it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Terrific!
txt: Even better than expected.  Love the digital display. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher
txt: The dishwasher is fantastic. My last one would not clean the dishes very well. Now looking at a Bosch mirowave. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Excellent
txt: Very quiet; does an excellent job of cleaning; and the extra top tray has proven to be quite useful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Looks good, quiet, cleans dishes, easy to maintain
txt: I had a Hotpoint basic dishwasher (DW) for almost 30 years when the springs for the door broke. I decided to purchase a new one. Two items sold me on the Bosch 300 DW: the physical buttons on the face of the dishwasher, and the ease in which the filter came out and could be replaced after cleaning. I literally removed and replaced all the filters on the dishwashers I was considering. The Bosch dishwashers were simple to remove and replace. No other DW considered even came close. Regarding use: my dishes are clean and mostly dry except for some puddling on top of some mugs.  I did bounce up the setting for the drying liquid and dishes are as dry as possible. The dishwasher is very quiet particularly compared to my old one. Installation did take both a plumber and an electrician since my old DW was wired in, not plugged in, and a new electrical outlet had to be installed. I am enjoying using this new appliance! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch dishwasher
txt: I love it. The dishes are spotless. The 3rd level tray is perfect for silverware and cooking utensils. The adjustable upper rack is great for accommodating large items. It is a great machine! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: BOSCH DISHWASHER
txt: EXCELLENT DISHWASHER. QUIET, ENERGY EFFICIENT, AND GET THE DISHES AND PANS SPOTLESS. COULDN'T BE HAPPIER!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Good wash, difficult loading
txt: Rarely any need to rewash anything, but the layout of the shelves makes loading challenging. The extra tray at the top reduces the height of the upper shelf so plastic kids plates and taller glasses can be tough to get it and that isn't helped by the extra fold down tray on the right side of the upper rack that makes it harder to get glasses in on the right side - surely this tray is no longer needed??? On the lower shelf, fitting larger pans in is tough with the racks being in two directions. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Happy with purchase
txt: Very, very quiet. The dishes get clean. Sometimes I'm challenged to get all the dishes to fit easily into the racks. It's not of question of too many dishes, rather the angle of the plate and dish holders don't easily accomodate the sides of our bowls and containers without taking up a lot of rack real estate. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Owner
txt: Nice dish washer very quiet [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Excellent
txt: I love my Bosch dishwasher.  Dishes are always clean and maintenance is easy.  Would definitely recommend.

title: good product
txt: we think its more quieter  then the previous Bosch dishwasher we had the only disappointment part is that it dont buzz when the dishes are done like the previous Bosch did. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch
txt: very quiet, solid, good looking dishwasher. Really like the i hour washing feature which does a great job of cleaning dishes. Easy to use controls. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: BOSCH 300 Series Dishwasher
txt: This dishwasher lived up to my expectations. It holds more than my previous 25 year old dishwasher. The biggest criticism I'd seen was that it didn't dry the dishes. My first load did have a slight problem but I put it down to incorrect loading of glasses rack and not using the extra dry button. Haven't had a problem since then even with plastic. My plastic is actually dryer than in my previous dishwasher. And it is so quiet. I have to look at the controls to be sure it's running. Thanks for making such a nice product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: dishwasher
txt: Dishwasher cycles are hard to program. not user friendly.

title: What dishwasher ?
txt: This dishwasher is so quite it's hard to know its running.  It does a great job of cleaning and although leaves a small amout of moisture no big deal.  Highly Recommend ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Good product
txt: I like the dishwasher.  It cleans well and dries everything, even plastics much better than my old dishwasher did.  It is quiet which is good.  It does take much longer to run than my old dishwasher, but I guess that is normal for dishwashers these days.  Should be saving me a lot of water by the stats.  The one thing I don't like is the 3rd shelf.  I thought I would love it, but I have to give up something.  If I have the middle shelf set to a higher level in the dishwasher in order to fit plates and cutting boards on the bottom without the sprayer arm running into them, then I cannot fit wine glasses in that middle shelf (they hit the top shelf).  If I put the middle shelf down lower to fit those wine glasses, then the plates and cutting boards hit the sprayer arms.  I think my plates and cutting boards are a pretty normal size-not overly big.  So I have given up putting wine glasses in and washing them by hand unfortunately. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher is very quiet and seems to clean well. Cycles...
txt: Dishwasher is very quiet and seems to clean well. Cycles are long but that’s OK with me. Home Depot install was a fail though. They lost the toe kick plate and refused to install because I had hard wire to the old dishwasher. They couldn’t do simple electrical work so I had to bring in locals to do.

title: Great Dishwasher
txt: I love how quiet this dishwasher is!  It also holds a lot of dishes, especially with the third rack for lids and utensils. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love this dishwasher!
txt: I did a lot of research and most of it pointed to the Bosch dishwasher. It is definitely quieter most of the time when it's running than any other dishwasher I've had And the dishes are definitely cleaner! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

txt: We like most aspects of this dishwasher a lot, but it does not do nearly as good a job of drying dishes as the similarly-priced Bosch we purchased 6-7 years ago (and sold with the house it was installed in).  Very disappointing in that respect, deducting 1 star.

title: Easy installation,  cleans the dishes well, and quiet....
txt: Easy installation,  cleans the dishes well, and quiet.

title: Great Machine
txt: Very quiet and always perfectly clean dishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher Bosch
txt:
This dishwasher is so awesome..it has actual lighted buttons that you can push. It really distresses my day..when it is finished washing the light stays on to remind you that the dishes are clean ready and waiting for you..love it..nothing like just getting ready to fix dinner and oh my gosh forgot the dishwasher was still full..well not with this wonderful Bosch dishwasher..I can't tell you enough how much I absolutely love my Bosch dishwasher..oh and it gets every speck of food off of the dishes..stemware sparkles no spots,blotches or streaks...I have purchased many many dishwashers in my life and this one by far "out shines"
All of them.
Including hand washing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: I thought I would love the 3 racks, but am...
txt: I thought I would love the 3 racks, but am finding that I would rather have 2 racks.  With the configuration of the 2 bottoms racks, I have to sacrifice something.  If I raise the middle rack in order to fit plates and cutting boards, then it is too high and wine glasses hit the top rack.  Lower the middle rack so wine glasses fit, and plates hit the sprayer arm so it can't go around properly.  I feel like I have normal sized plates, so this might be a problem for others as well.  Other than that, it cleans well, is quiet and seems like a good dishwasher.  I have to get used to the longer wash time-over 2 hours!  One thing I do really like about it is that it dries everything well, even plastics.

title: Performance is very good.  Small downside is the amount...
txt: Performance is very good.  Small downside is the amount of time for all things in the washer to dry.  This we knew going in so it is a problem for us.  For the money, this was a good purchase.

title: The machine itself works great but it’s missing toe panel...
txt: The machine itself works great but it’s missing toe panel parts.  That is completely unimportant to the working of the machine but dealing with Bosch and Home Depot has been frustrating. That is not a good omen if there were to be future critical issues.

title: Who knew! :)

title: lack of drying of dishes and tub remaining wet
txt: We had purchased a Bosh dishwasher 5 years ago in another house and loved it. When the dishwasher in current house failed we did not hesitate to buy a Bosh although it was more expensive. The first time we used the new dishwasher, the dishes and inside of the tub were very wet. We then tried using Extra Dry. The dishes and tub were better but still very wet. We read through the documentation and set the default to extra dry. We ran a load of dishes before being gone for the weekend. When returning, we found that the dishes and tub were still WET! We did some research and found that this was a common complaint of this dishwasher. We returned the Bosh and bought an LG. The LG is working well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Error codes left and RJ
txt:
Purchased this about two years ago.  A few months after installation error code 24 appeared and has not stopped.  I went to the troubleshooting guide to address and went through all the steps.  I called the service co and was told to reset the code.  Which I did.  It happened a few other times since.  Called back to schedule a service call and I am now being told we are out of warranty.  In addition this may now be a circuit panel issue and a  $250 expense.

Not very happy!!

title: Is it even running?!

Our family got used to working around this noise pollution, but when we got our new dishwasher and they turned it on for the first time you can't even hear it!! The other big feature I really like, is the completely stainless steel tub.  The trap in my old dishwasher was GROSS and discolored plastic garbage, but with the stainless steel, I can pull it out and sanitize it to my liking.
This is an awesome dishwasher.  I would 100% recommend to anyone looking for a new dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: New Bosh Dishwasher
txt:
We love our new Bosh 300 Series Dishwasher.

I installed it myself (I am an avid DYI guy). The instalation was easy eventhough I had some little odd features that I had put into the original dishwasher instalation at the end of a counter that goes out into the kitchen. The counter is a combination of stock and custom make cabintry and required some creative wiring and plumbing. The Bosh instalation proceedure was clear and easy to adapt.

The new Bosh is 100% quieter then our previous brand. The first few time we used my wife and I were asking each other if we had turned on the dishwasher?

I think the Bosh easily removable/cleanable skreen in the wash tank is wonderful. Our last brand had a little screen and chopper that was a major project to get to and got clogged quite a bit.

The Bosh will be easy to clean out any odd debris.

The Bosh is also cleaning our dishes to a brite spakeling shine.

Great Dishwasher! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: The build quality is the key.
txt:
Over the past few years, we have slowly been replacing our aging appliances on an as-needed basis. It began a decade ago with our washer and dryer and that's when we started looking at Bosch appliances. Our experience with even the base-line Bosch products is that the build quality is excellent. When you focus on the basics and do it well, everything else falls into place - and that is exactly what Bosch has done. 

We chose this specific model of dishwasher because it did not have the typical membrane-style control panel. Call me old-fashioned but, physical switches appealed to me. The Maytag dishwasher we replaced suffered many issues over the years, having to replace the control board and control panel a couple times. When the problem arose again, we decided to cut our losses and again look at the Bosch appliances, due mostly to our experience with the washer/dryer set we purchased 10+ years ago. I have to say, to get into the ballpark build quality of the base-line Bosch, you have to buy mid-line or better of the typical brands. And even then, they're not quite up to the level of this Bosch. This isn't hyperbole, it's fact. I encourage you to truly comparison shop.

Installation was a snap, it was a push-in replacement. And holy cow - the sound level of this thing is incredibly quiet. That first run, I had to open it to make sure it was in-fact operating. That is no exaggeration. The quality of the cleaning is excellent. Coming from the old Maytag, where we had to pre-rinse everything, now having the ability to just toss in the dirty place settings and go is nice. The only detraction of points I would give is that the drying is not quite as good as it could be. But I think this is probably more to do with Energy Star ratings, as almost all other brands seem to have similar issues noted in ratings. And honestly, it's not a BIG deal. And certainly not unlike others on the market. Energy ratings are going to drive this issue regardless of brand.

The bottom line is I whole-heartedly recommend this Bosch dishwasher. It performs very well, is insanely quiet, and was a snap to install. I've been using it daily for a month and couldn't be happier with the decision. And if my experience holds, as with the Bosch washer and dryer purchase I made over a decade ago, I expect this dishwasher to be a true workhorse in the kitchen: strong and reliable. You cannot ask for more than that. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dishwasher
txt: This is a super roomy and super quiet dishwasher! Runs GREAT! The only problem we have with it is that it is so well sealed that there is an odor in it after the dirty dishes sit in it for a day. We are rinsing our dishes of any really stinky stuff and pouring a bit of water into the trap in order to help eliminate some of the odor. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dishwasher

title: Dishwasher

title: Very disappointed!
txt: So disappointed in this supposed “quality” dishwasher!!! If you cook AT ALL or have kids....DO NOT BUY!!! Seriously, a 9x13 pan DOES NOT even fit correctly . You have to lie it flat which takes up most the space. If you make lasagna with other pans and plates look for a different dishwasher!! I called BOSCH customer service and she said she and her husband had the same issue with the same pan over the weekend. I also called the store where I bought It. Apparently it only works if you take out the utensil tray. Say what? I did so and per instructions used the upper rack for utensils. They came out DIRTY and the pan STILL had to lie down anyway. VERY POOR design. Then there is the top drawer that you have to slam shut to get it to wedge into position so the door closes and locks. The glasses cling and fall over. The customer service agent agreed that this is a flaw but tried to change my term of “slam” into what they call “firm push”.... Bosch, are you serious?? Obviously an engineer who doesn’t cook or have kids designed the stupid thing. The buttons are super cheap, wire drawer slots WAY to close together, some at an extreme slant for not great purpose ....customer service agreed they get lots of calls on this. I run my dishwasher twice a day. Huge buyer remorse and never again Bosch!!!

title: Great dishwasher

The third rack is perfect for both large utensils and small baby bottle components. I am extremely pleased with how clean the dishes come out. I did take the manufacturer recommendations and use Finish detergent pods and also the Jet Dry. So far there is nothing I dislike about it, and it more than met my expectations.

The ONLY thing I'm not 100% crazy about is the upper shelf rack (for lids and flat things) - I would rather have just two racks and a little more head room for the higher rack. My wife loves the upper shelf rack but then if we didn't have something to disagree about, what in the world would we talk about? :) This dishwasher is COMICALLY quiet. As in, first few times I used it, I wasn't even sure if I correctly started it. Bosch makes a darn fine product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: So quiet!!
txt:
We purchased this model to replace our older, very loud unit.  What a difference!  We can now run the dishwasher and still hold a conversation without shouting at one another.  
The 3rd rack for utensils is a wonderful option, freeing up more area in the lower rack for larger items.  The extra dry option leaves plastic items fully dry at the end of the cycle.  Yay!  No more having to towel dry them.  :)  
The length  of the cycles seems a bit longer than with our old dishwasher, but we will gladly trade the extra time for the silence in our home. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: New BOSCH Dishwasher
txt: Last year when we rented a house, it had a BOSCH dishwasher.  This year when we bought a house, it needed a new dishwasher.  When I walked into the appliance store, I told the sales associate to show me the BOSCH dishwashers.  I didn't even consider another brand.  They have several styles available so I was able to choose one that was perfect for our needs.  It's very easy to operate, has many convenient features and is extremely efficient.  Plus, in making the purchase I felt I was supporting our local community, as we live in New Bern, NC where there's a large Bosch plant!

title: Buyer beware
txt: Do not buy a Bosch dishwasher. I've had it less than a year before it randomly no longer would come on. I called Bosch they gave me the number of someone who does repairs for them. They came out and diagnosed the problem. It has been a month now and they have not received the part from Bosch. I called Bosch and the part is on backorder and they don't know when they will get more. My question is how many of these are going bad that they're on backorder?

Wish I had fixed my old Kitchenaid, but no parts, built in obsolescence.  I guess we just keep taking it as consumers.  I give up.Lee Leighton
